pr_title: [BEAM-5605] Add support for executing pair with restriction, split restriction, split and size restriction, process element and restriction and process sized element and restriction within the Java SDK harness.

timeline.message:
[BEAM-5605] Add support for executing pair with restriction, split restriction, split and size restriction, process element and restriction and process sized element and restriction within the Java SDK harness.

I removed the SplittableProcessElementsRunner and call the DoFnInvoker directly.
I plan to have a follow-up change that removes the "context" object as it is no longer necessary.

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this method also produce sizes, like the output method above?
timeline.author: youngoli

replies.bodyText:
Yes, fixed in the version below.
I'm relying on the migration to using SDF everywhere will catch the edge cases via the validates runner tests since unit testing the execution of a single instance is quite verbose.
replies.author: lukecwik
